sourcesContent: import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { switchMap } from 'rxjs/operators'; import { AnimaisService } from './../animais.service'; import { UsuarioService } from './../../autenticacao/usuario/usuario.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Animais } from '../animais'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs/internal/Observable'; @Component({ selector: 'app-lista-animais', templateUrl: './lista-animais.component.html', styleUrls: ['./lista-animais.component.css'] }) export class ListaAnimaisComponent implements OnInit { animais!: Animais; constructor( private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.params.subscribe(param => { this.animais = this.activatedRoute.snapshot.data['animais']; }) } }
